thread.title: Emily Blunt refuses to do nude scene for 'Sicario'
thread.title_full: Emily Blunt refuses to do nude scene for 'Sicario' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Emily Blunt refuses to do nude scene for 'Sicario'
text:
Actress Emily Blunt says she will not do nude scenes unless it is absolutely necessary for the movie's plot.
READ: Emily Blunt apologises for her comments about the GOP debate
The actress said she blocked a topless scene for her cartel thriller Sicario after consulting her own body on the matter, reported Digital Spy.
"(A nude scene) was in there originally but it came out because we didn't agree with it," Blunt said.
"Benicio (del Toro) backed me up. It was a scene between he and I. He's like my brother now."
Sicario , which also stars Josh Brolin alongside Blunt and del Toro, is earning rave reviews from critics.
